channel.title: A little help
channel.description: Hey guys just a quick question, i was wondering if someone could come up with a way to make a certain area (like ::jail) where you cannot teleport out, even with the emote tabs? If anyone can come up with that it would be gladly appreciated, thanks everyone.

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

make a boolean declaring the area

then in proces
if (isINarea) {
teleBlock = true;
}

Read full topic
